name: FishOrChicken
description:
You are a trendy YouTubird
In a certain building, there was a series of sightings of suspicious shadows in offices and hallways.
The owner of the building asks you to investigate the building as a shooting project, but...?

easy operation
Use WASD to move and mouse to point the direction to attack!
During battle, left-click to enlarge the screen, right-click to pause!

To equip a purchased weapon,
Click on the item in the
"インベントリ"
You can equip up to 6 items, and the items will automatically attack.

Fish or chicken uses the activity time of the day
It is a roguelite game that dives into dungeons.
You can take your time and prepare your equipment beforehand!
You can spend as much time as possible challenging the dungeon with minimal shopping!
Clear the questions given on each stage and proceed to the next floor!
